channel.title: RuneReborn: Login and Pk!
channel.description:
[B][URL=http://s1274.photobucket.com/user/SomeRender/media/rrpic_zps54cfbd6f.png.html][IMG]http://i1274.photobucket.com/albums/y424/SomeRender/rrpic_zps54cfbd6f.png[/img][/URL]
RuneReborn is a private server most commonly knew as DeviousPk. After some accidents, we changed our name to Runereborn. The staff are doing their best to bring this server back to the top. RuneReborn is up 24/7 and ran on a powerful dedicated server. We're here to offer people a great time on our server which has alot of features which are listed below. Join us now at www.RuneReborn.com.
Features: [*]- 24.7 Uptime [*]- Vote for Rewards [-**]- x2 Donations weekend [*]- Webclient [*]- Active helpful staff [*]- 2 Levels of Donator status [*]- Completely Lag Free! [*]- 100% working leeches [*]- Runescape like Combat [*]- redone accuracy to be like runescape [*]- Working Korasi’s Sword [*]- Multi Barrages [*]- Xp Counter [*]- Working weapon specs and effects [*]- Working curses prayer book, including turmoil! [*]- All spell books, Moderns, Ancients and Lunars [*]- All Spirit shields working, Even their affects. [*]- Working Teleblock [*]- Amazing Switches [*]- Active Tournament Events [*]- A fully working Dicing System [*]- Active PK community [*]- Multipking [*]- Great Forums
[COLOR="#0000FF"]PICTURES:[/COLOR]
[spoiler=Pictures][img]http://gyazo.com/ac5f628bbeadd8279d0f45f273484008.png[/img]
[img]http://gyazo.com/072d1ac7072d736390753aa580698362.png[/img]
[img]http://gyazo.com/183394f18be5aec5efb4e88ed041208c.png[/img]
[img]http://gyazo.com/14ddaab328c4682f0470886aea2ccd68.png[/img]
[img]http://gyazo.com/ee9c3169c2b3ce547c3f11ed219a1285.png[/img]
[img]http://gyazo.com/00e53d7b025c975c27c9c947d09b5019.png[/img][/spoiler]
[COLOR="#0000FF"]VIDEOS:[/COLOR] Note that our name is now RUNEREBORN and used to be DeviousPk. OUR NEW DOMAIN AND SERVER IS LOCATED AT www.RuneReborn.com!
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hqWuu5zgbSY
Come join the best spawn server, login and pk! www.Runereborn.com

RuneReborn is a private server most commonly knew as DeviousPk. After some accidents, we changed our name to Runereborn. The staff are doing their best to bring this server back to the top. RuneReborn is up 24/7 and ran on a powerful dedicated server. We’re here to offer people a great time on our server which has alot of features which are listed below.
